title: Chain Guillotines
summaries: The Chain Guillotines are a Hardmode autoswinging flail dropped by Corrupt Mimics. The weapon fires two blade projectiles attached to chains in rapid succession, with a maximum range of 22 tiles.
It can also pierce multiple enemies when standing inside them or very close, therefore being a lot more effective at close quarters.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 59 / 43 (Melee)
